basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Several years experience in providing information and creating software solutions for business needs and efficiencies. Three plus years experience in varying accounting positions. Work well independently and as part of a team. Knowledgeable in use of MS Office products.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared, amended and reviewed individual income tax returns. Assisted in individual tax planning and preparation of corporate income tax returns.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for enhancements to software written in COBOL and CL on an IBM System i (AS/400, iSeries, Power System).

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised the General Accounting system, including the preparation of timely and accurate financial reports and the maintenance of the general ledger...etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Modified existing software written in COBOL on the IBM System/36 to price products according to the client's specifications. Designed and programmed an Inventory system that interfaced with the existing invoicing system.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: A software development company specializing in Pharmacy, Seed and Banking applications. Responsible for program development and modifications in COBOL (5 years) and BASIC (5 years).

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Bank with headquarters in Minneapolis, MN that later merged with Wells Fargo & Co. Responsible for the preparation of month-end financial statements, quarterly Call Reports and internal reports.
